metadata.purpose: Proof-of-concept image generation to validate approach for young child character
metadata.age_appropriate_note: CRITICAL: All scenes must be completely age-appropriate for a 5-year-old child. NO nudity, NO suggestive content.

scenes.title: Pre-Dawn Bedroom
scenes.lighting: dim gray Portland morning light through curtains
scenes.description: A 5-year-old girl with light skin and straight light brown hair sleeps in a twin bed with a purple guardrail, tucked under a purple comforter with white stars. The lavender-painted walls have crayon drawings taped up. A white bookshelf holds picture books. A wooden toy chest with a painted rainbow sits against the wall. On the white dresser, a hamster cage holds a golden Syrian hamster on an exercise wheel. A moon-shaped nightlight glows amber. Glow-in-the-dark stars dot the ceiling. A lavender rug covers the hardwood floor.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 5-year-old girl with light skin, straight light brown hair sleeping in twin bed, purple star comforter, purple bed guardrail, lavender walls with crayon drawings taped up, white bookshelf with picture books, wooden toy chest with rainbow, hamster cage on white dresser with golden hamster, moon-shaped nightlight glowing amber, glow-in-the-dark stars on ceiling, lavender rug on hardwood floor, peaceful child's bedroom, dim gray morning light through curtains
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, adult, teenager, mature, sexy, revealing, dark room, scary, inappropriate

scenes.title: Checking on Biscuit
scenes.camera_view: at dresser, close-up on hamster cage
scenes.description: Sophie pads across the lavender rug to the white dresser, standing on tiptoe to peer into Biscuit's cage. The wire cage has a green plastic base with wood shavings bedding. The golden-tan Syrian hamster sits nibbling a sunflower seed in his tiny paws. A silver exercise wheel stands at one end. A red water bottle hangs on the cage wall. A ceramic food bowl with pellets sits near a plastic igloo hideout. Sophie presses her face close to the cage bars, hazel eyes wide, gap-toothed smile spreading.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 5-year-old girl with light skin, rosy cheeks, straight light brown messy hair, wearing light purple star pajamas, standing on tiptoe at white dresser peering into hamster cage, golden Syrian hamster inside nibbling sunflower seed, wire cage with exercise wheel and water bottle, gap-toothed delighted smile, child's bedroom, gray morning light, pet care moment
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, adult, teenager, mature, sexy, revealing, inappropriate, tall child

scenes.title: Making the Bed
scenes.description: Sophie stands beside her twin bed, pulling the purple star comforter up toward the pillow with both small hands. The comforter bunches unevenly — a 5-year-old's earnest but imperfect attempt. The purple bed guardrail frames one side. The stuffed bunny and plush giraffe sit on the pillow. Glow-in-the-dark stars are faded dots on the ceiling. The wooden toy chest with rainbow is visible at the foot of the bed.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 5-year-old girl with light skin, rosy cheeks, messy light brown hair, wearing light purple star pajamas, making bed imperfectly, pulling purple star comforter up, stuffed bunny and giraffe on pillow, purple bed guardrail, lavender walls, child's room, gray morning light, earnest child effort at chores
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, adult, teenager, mature, sexy, revealing, perfect bed making, inappropriate

scenes.title: Putting On the T-Shirt
scenes.description: Sophie pulls a bright teal t-shirt with a rainbow-and-clouds print over her head, her light brown hair getting mussed through the neck hole. Her arms push through the short sleeves. The shirt is slightly crooked. Kate stands nearby. Sophie's round face emerges through the collar, cheeks flushed, gap-toothed smile triumphant. The hamster cage is visible on the dresser behind them.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 5-year-old girl with light skin, rosy cheeks, messy light brown hair, pulling teal rainbow t-shirt over head, dressing herself, triumphant expression, gap-toothed smile, mother standing nearby, hamster cage on dresser in background, child's bedroom, gray morning light, getting dressed independently
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, adult, teenager, mature, sexy, revealing, inappropriate, nudity

scenes.title: Falling Asleep
scenes.description: Sophie's bedroom is quiet and dim, lit by the amber moon-shaped nightlight and glow-in-the-dark stars on the ceiling. Sophie lies in her twin bed under the purple star comforter, eyes closed, face peaceful. Her light brown hair spreads across the white pillow. The stuffed bunny is tucked under her chin. On the dresser, Biscuit's cage is draped with a purple cloth, the exercise wheel spinning softly. The toy chest is a dark shape. Portland rain falls steadily against the window.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 5-year-old girl with light skin, light brown hair sleeping peacefully in twin bed, purple star comforter, stuffed bunny under chin, moon-shaped nightlight amber glow, glow-in-the-dark stars on ceiling, hamster cage draped with cloth on dresser, dark quiet bedroom, rain on window, peaceful child sleeping, bedtime
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, adult, teenager, mature, sexy, revealing, bright lights, daytime, inappropriate

scenes.title: Stepping Onto the Step Stool
scenes.description: Sophie steps onto the white plastic step stool at the sink, rising to see herself in the round mirror. Her reflection shows a 5-year-old girl with rosy cheeks, light brown ponytail, teal rainbow t-shirt and striped leggings. She grips the sink edge. The frog-shaped ceramic toothbrush holder has her purple kids' toothbrush and mom's white toothbrush. Kids' bubblegum toothpaste sits beside it. A bar of soap rests in a ceramic dish.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 5-year-old girl with light skin, rosy cheeks, light brown hair in messy ponytail, wearing teal rainbow t-shirt, standing on white step stool at bathroom sink, looking at reflection in round mirror, purple toothbrush in frog holder, kids toothpaste tube, bright bathroom light, white subway tile walls, child morning hygiene routine
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, adult, teenager, mature, sexy, revealing, tall enough without stool, inappropriate, nudity

scenes.title: Brushing Teeth
scenes.description: Sophie brushes her teeth with the purple kids' toothbrush, moving it back and forth. Pink-blue foam forms around her mouth. She watches herself in the round mirror, concentrating. The gap where her missing front tooth was is visible as she brushes around it. She stands on the white step stool. The bubblegum toothpaste tube lies on the sink edge.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 5-year-old girl with light skin, rosy cheeks, light brown ponytail, brushing teeth with purple children's toothbrush, foam around mouth, standing on step stool at bathroom sink, watching reflection in mirror, gap where missing front tooth was, bright bathroom light, morning hygiene routine, white tile walls
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, adult, teenager, adult toothbrush, perfect teeth, mature, sexy, inappropriate, nudity

scenes.title: Drying Face with Frog Towel
scenes.description: Sophie reaches for her green hooded frog towel on the low hook. The hood has two round frog eyes on top. She presses the soft fabric against her wet face. The frog hood flops over her head, the round frog eyes sitting comically above her forehead. She lowers the towel, face fresh, and hangs it back on the hook.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 5-year-old girl with light skin, rosy cheeks, light brown ponytail, pressing green hooded frog towel to face, frog hood with round eyes on her head, standing at bathroom sink, bright bathroom light, cute child drying face, frog towel comically on head, white tile walls, morning routine
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, adult, teenager, mature, sexy, inappropriate, nudity, revealing

scenes.title: Washing Hands After Toilet
scenes.description: Sophie stands on the white step stool at the sink, rubbing her hands under running water with pink liquid soap. She scrubs her palms, backs of hands, and between fingers — counting to twenty. The round mirror reflects her concentrated face. The frog toothbrush holder and toothpaste are on the sink edge. The light blue fish-print shower curtain is visible behind her.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 5-year-old girl with light skin, rosy cheeks, light brown ponytail, standing on step stool washing hands at bathroom sink, pink soap bubbles between small fingers, concentrated expression, round mirror reflection, frog toothbrush holder, light blue fish shower curtain background, bright bathroom light, child hygiene routine
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, adult, teenager, mature, sexy, inappropriate, nudity, dirty

scenes.title: Bubble Bath — Wrapped in Towel After
scenes.description: Sophie stands on the gray tile floor wrapped in her green hooded frog towel from head to toe. The frog hood sits on her head with round frog eyes above her forehead. The towel drapes around her small body like a robe. Her face peeks out, rosy and damp, light brown hair wet and dark. She grins her gap-toothed grin. Behind her, rubber ducks and a blue boat float in remaining bath water. Kate kneels beside her, rubbing the towel over her hair.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 5-year-old girl wrapped in green hooded frog towel head to toe, frog eyes on hood above forehead, standing on bathroom floor after bath, rosy cheeks, wet light brown hair, gap-toothed grin, mother kneeling drying hair, rubber ducks and toy boat in bathtub behind, bright bathroom light, cozy bath time scene, child-appropriate
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, adult, teenager, mature, sexy, inappropriate, nudity, revealing, no towel, undressed

scenes.title: Circle Time Gathering
scenes.description: Sophie sits cross-legged on the ABC rug with fifteen other kindergarteners in a rough circle. She sits on the letter S, hands in her lap. She wears her teal rainbow t-shirt and striped leggings. Her ponytail is slightly askew. The teacher Mrs. Chen sits in a low chair holding a picture book. The alphabet banner is on the wall above. The calendar with weather chart shows a rain cloud icon.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 5-year-old girl with light skin, rosy cheeks, light brown ponytail, sitting cross-legged on colorful ABC rug with classmates in circle, wearing teal rainbow t-shirt and striped leggings, teacher sitting in low chair holding picture book, alphabet banner on wall, calendar with weather chart, bright colorful kindergarten classroom, circle time

scenes.title: Glue Stick Craft
scenes.description: Sophie stands at the art supply station, a low table covered in newspaper. She holds a purple glue stick and smears it on the back of an orange construction paper circle. She is making a paper caterpillar — three circles already glued on green paper. A cup of googly eyes, child-safe scissors with green handles, and pre-cut circles in various colors are on the table. Finger paint jars sit on a shelf above. Sophie has a smear of glue on her cheek.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 5-year-old girl with light skin, rosy cheeks, loose light brown hair, wearing art smock, holding purple glue stick making paper caterpillar craft, colorful construction paper circles on green paper, googly eyes and scissors on newspaper-covered table, bright kindergarten classroom, art activity, glue smear on cheek, creative child
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, adult, teenager, mature, sexy, inappropriate, neat and clean, professional art

scenes.title: Playground — Swinging
scenes.description: Sophie sits on a black rubber swing seat on the school playground, gripping the metal chains. A playground aide pushes her. Sophie swings forward, red polka-dot rain boots stretched out against the gray sky, ponytail flying under the yellow hood. She laughs with gap-toothed joy. The swing set has a green metal frame. The playground has wet wood chips. A climbing structure with a blue slide is in the background. Douglas fir trees line the school grounds.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 5-year-old girl with light skin, rosy cheeks, light brown ponytail, sitting on playground swing, wearing yellow rain jacket and red polka dot rain boots, gripping metal chains, swinging forward with boots stretched out, joyful laughing expression with missing tooth gap, overcast Portland sky, wet playground wood chips, green trees in background, recess time
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, adult, teenager, mature, sexy, inappropriate, sunny weather, alone, dangerous

scenes.title: Finger Painting
scenes.camera_view: at art table, close-up on hands
scenes.description: Sophie stands at the art table covered in newspaper, wearing a large button-up shirt as an art smock. Three jars of finger paint — red, blue, yellow — are open. She dips her right hand into the blue paint and presses it on white paper, leaving a bright blue handprint. She examines the print, seeing her palm lines in blue. A classmate has made red handprints. Sophie's left hand has yellow paint from earlier. Paint dots her smock and one cheek.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 5-year-old girl with light skin, rosy cheeks, loose light brown hair, wearing oversized shirt as art smock, dipping hand into blue finger paint, pressing handprint on white paper, jars of red blue yellow paint open, paint on cheek and hands, bright kindergarten classroom, art activity, messy creative fun, newspaper covered table

scenes.title: Toy Kitchen Play
scenes.description: Sophie stands at the child-sized toy kitchen — white with pink accents, small oven, stovetop with plastic knobs, pretend sink and faucet, upper cabinets. She holds a plastic frying pan and pretends to flip a plastic fried egg. Plastic food items are scattered — banana, apple, bread, cheese, carrot. A tiny plastic plate and cup sit on the counter. She wears a child-sized play apron with red polka dots. Her hair is loose. A toy cash register sits on a shelf nearby.
